solution_line_template: There are {fiction_books}+{more_non_fiction_than_fiction} = <<{fiction_books}+{more_non_fiction_than_fiction}={non_fiction_books}>>{non_fiction_books} non-fiction books on the cart.
There are {multiplier_autobiographies}*{fiction_books} = <<{multiplier_autobiographies}*{fiction_books}={autobiographies}>>{autobiographies} autobiographies on the cart.

There are {fiction_books}+{non_fiction_books}+{autobiographies} = <<{fiction_books}+{non_fiction_books}+{autobiographies}={total_known_books}>>{total_known_books} fiction, non-fiction, and autobiography books on the cart.
There are {total_books_on_cart}-{total_known_books} = <<{total_books_on_cart}-{total_known_books}={picture_books}>>{picture_books} picture books on the cart.
